document_data.name: ''Mark of Tyr''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Marks of Tyr''''' were [[amulet]]s of the [[Tyr]]ran faith in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Marks of Tyr'' were round [[gold]]en disks decorated with Tyr's ''[[holy symbol]]''. The gold discs hung off a thong that consisted of multiple segments, tied together.
document_data.Powers: A ''mark of Tyr'' possessed an enchantment that allowed its owner to compel their opponent to disarm themselves for a short period of time, deterring them from attacking or taking any offensive actions.
